Uses of Interface
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.AzResponseContext

Packages that use AzResponseContext
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi The AzApi package contains the interfaces that must be implemented by a provider. 
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep The goal of this package is to simplify the creation of Policy Enforcement Points or peps built on top of the azapi package (note that where the class descriptions below are blank, that generally means that the class is primarily used for lower layer non-application facing operations). 
 

Uses of AzResponseContext in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi that return AzResponseContext
 AzResponseContext AzService.decide(AzRequestContext azRequestContext)
          Returns the authorization decision(s) in an AzResponseContext object.
 AzResponseContext AzService.queryVerbose(java.lang.String scope, AzRequestContext azRequestContext)
          Returns an AzResponseContext that contains all the results for queries that are within the specified "scope", where "scope" is a String expression representing a set of target resources.
 

Uses of AzResponseContext in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep that return AzResponseContext
 AzResponseContext PepResponse.getAzResponseContext()
          The handle to the actual AzResponseContext, which may be used with the interfaces provided in the org.openliberty.openaz.azapi package.
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep with parameters of type AzResponseContext
 PepResponse PepResponseFactory.createPepResponse(AzResponseContext responseContext, PepRequest pepRequest, PepRequestOperation operation)
          Create a PepResponse based on the AzResponseContext
